title: Knife, ca. 1775–1800
markings: On blade: crown GR IEF RIS
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade, plain bolster. Silver ferrule with scalloped edge. Pistol-shaped handle decorated in relief with floral sprays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1775–1800.
ca. 1775–1800. steel, porcelain, silver. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-202.
